title: Cataract Surgeries
minidescription: Help restore sight with cataract surgeries for elders in need.
description: Help restore the precious gift of sight for elders suffering from cataracts. Many senior citizens lose their vision due to untreated cataracts, limiting their independence and quality of life. Your contribution will directly fund essential cataract surgeries, covering consultation, surgical procedures, prosthetic lenses, and follow-up care. Each surgery provides elders with renewed hope, mobility, and the ability to enjoy life again. Your kindness can transform a life today.

title: Foldable Lenses + Medicines
minidescription: Support post-surgery care with foldable lenses and essential medicines.
description: Your support provides high-quality foldable intraocular lenses and essential medicines for elders undergoing eye surgeries. These lenses ensure better visual clarity while medicines help prevent infection and support faster healing. Many elders cannot afford these vital items on their own, and your generosity ensures they receive complete and proper post-surgical care for long-term vision improvement.

title: Spectacles (1 pair)
minidescription: Provide a pair of spectacles to help an elder regain their vision clarity.
description: A simple pair of spectacles can significantly improve the day-to-day life of an elder. Many senior citizens struggle with blurry vision due to age-related conditions but cannot afford personalized corrective eyewear. Your donation ensures an elder receives a custom-calibrated pair of spectacles that enhances their independence, safety, and overall quality of life.

title: Cost to provide a Wheel Chair
minidescription: Provide mobility and independence through a wheelchair donation.
description: A wheelchair can completely transform the life of an elder struggling with limited mobility. Your contribution provides a sturdy, comfortable, and safe wheelchair that allows elders to move freely, participate in daily activities, and regain their sense of dignity. This support is especially vital for those with disabilities, chronic illness, or recovering from surgery.

title: Commode Chair
minidescription: Help elders live with dignity and comfort by donating a commode chair.
description: A commode chair provides essential support for elders with mobility difficulties or medical conditions that make regular bathroom use challenging. Your donation ensures they can maintain hygiene comfortably and safely at home. This simple but vital device greatly improves independence and helps elders preserve dignity in their daily routines.

title: Walking Frame
minidescription: Assist elders in maintaining mobility and safety with a durable walking frame.
description: A durable walking frame offers stability and balance for elders who face difficulty walking due to weakness, injury, or age-related issues. Your donation will help an elder move around safely and confidently, reducing the risk of falls and improving their overall well-being. Each walking frame brings renewed independence and freedom.

title: Hearing Aid
minidescription: Bring back the joy of hearing to an elder with your hearing aid donation.
description: Hearing loss isolates many elders from conversations, social activities, and emotional connection. With your donation, a high-quality hearing aid will be provided to an elder who cannot afford one. This life-changing device allows them to communicate, engage with loved ones, and regain confidence in daily interactions.

title: Crutches
minidescription: Support recovery and mobility by donating a pair of sturdy crutches.
description: Crutches are essential for elders recovering from fractures, surgeries, or mobility impairments. Your contribution provides high-quality crutches designed to offer comfort, balance, and safety. This donation empowers elders to move independently during recovery, significantly improving their mobility and day-to-day living.

title: Walking Stick
minidescription: Provide stability and confidence to elders by gifting a walking stick.
description: A walking stick offers support, stability, and confidence to elders who face mild to moderate mobility challenges. Your donation helps prevent falls, improves balance, and enables elders to move safely in their homes and communities. It is a simple tool that brings immense support and independence.

title: Day Care Centre
minidescription: Support our Day Care Centre programs that engage and care for senior citizens.
description: Our Day Care Centre provides a safe, nurturing, and socially engaging environment for senior citizens. Elders participate in activities such as exercise, health check-ups, meals, entertainment, and companionship. Your donation supports daily meals, maintenance, and full-day care programs designed to enhance the physical and emotional well-being of elders. Through your generosity, we ensure they spend their day with joy, comfort, and dignity.

title: Tills Project
minidescription: Encourage small-scale community giving through our tills project.
description: The Tills Project promotes a culture of regular giving by providing donation tills to individuals, homes, and businesses. Participants contribute small amounts whenever possible, and collectively these contributions support elder welfare programs, medical assistance, and community services. Your support helps us distribute and maintain these tills, spreading compassion throughout the community.

title: Special Projects
minidescription: Support our ongoing special projects aimed at improving elder well-being and healthcare.
description: Our Special Projects focus on long-term initiatives that improve the lives of elders across the country. These projects may include medical camps, infrastructure improvements, rehabilitation programs, home-care support, and special welfare drives. Your contribution ensures that these long-term, high-impact programs continue to run successfully and reach elders who need assistance the most.

title: Direct Mail Appeals
minidescription: Help us reach more donors and spread awareness through direct mail campaigns.
description: Direct Mail Appeals help us reach compassionate individuals who may wish to support our programs but are unaware of the needs. These campaigns include designing, printing, and distributing informative mailers that share our mission and highlight urgent needs. Your donation expands our outreach efforts and helps bring more donors into our community of care.

title: Greeting Cards
minidescription: Purchase or donate towards greeting cards that help fund our elder care programs.
description: Our Greeting Cards initiative allows supporters to purchase meaningful cards for special occasions. All funds collected through the sale of these cards go directly towards elder welfare activities, medical treatments, day care support, and community programs. By purchasing or sponsoring greeting cards, you share joy with others while also spreading kindness to elders in need.

title: Maintenance of the Eye Hospital
minidescription: Contribute to the upkeep of our Eye Hospital, ensuring sustainable services for those in need.
description: Our Eye Hospital provides free or affordable eye care services to thousands of elders every year. Your contribution supports essential maintenance, including equipment upkeep, sanitation, utilities, and facility improvements. This ensures we continue delivering high-quality eye care for elders who depend on us for examinations, treatments, surgeries, and follow-up services.

title: Full Sponsorship per Day (to screen 150 elders)
minidescription: Sponsor a full day of screenings to provide free eye checkups for 150 elders.
description: By sponsoring a full day of eye screenings, you provide 150 elders with free consultations, eye tests, medical evaluations, and guidance for further treatments. Many elders cannot afford routine checkups, causing minor issues to become serious. Your sponsorship ensures early detection, timely medication, and referrals for surgeries when needed â€” helping prevent blindness and improving the quality of life.

title: Co-sponsorship per Day (to screen 150 elders)
minidescription: Join hands with other donors to co-sponsor a full day of elder eye screenings.
description: Co-sponsorship allows multiple donors to join together to support a full day of eye screenings for 150 elders. Your contribution covers a portion of the costs related to medical staff, testing equipment, medications, and facility expenses. This collective effort ensures more elders receive essential eye care and helps prevent avoidable blindness.
